about_the_game:
Title: BeanWars - A Fast-Paced, Bean-Themed Multiplayer Game

Description: Get ready for an epic battle of beans! In BeanWars, up to 20 players can choose from a variety of bean characters and engage in intense, free-for-all battles. With 11 different weapons and even more on the way, players can choose their own unique strategy to take down their opponents and become the ultimate bean champion!

Key Features:

Fast-paced multiplayer action with up to 20 players
Play as a variety of unique bean characters
11 different weapons to choose from ( more on realease )
Multiple strategic approaches to win
More updates and weapons on the way
Screenshots and Trailer: Check out the action-packed screenshots and trailer to see for yourself what BeanWars has to offer!

Join the Battle and Prove Your Bean-Based Dominance in BeanWars!

name: BeanWars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-3770 CPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-7700HQ CPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: BeanWars is a multiplayer game where players battle as beans with fast movement and a variety of weapons. You can play with up to 16 friends, and the game offers cosmetics for customization. Join the bean-based battle and show your dominance in BeanWars!
